sentences: Akira Jimbo, also transliterated as Akira Jinbo (神保 彰, Jinbo Akira, born February 27, 1959), is a Japanese jazz fusion drummer who combines electronic drum technology and acoustic drums.
He became a member of Casiopea in 1980.
During his solo career, he formed Jimsaku-duo with Casiopea's bassist Tetsuo Sakurai in 1989.
